Home » 40P14 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 14 Sāsavaduka
14.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Sāsavaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
17.
56Sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
57Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasāsavo ca naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
58Sāsavañca anāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
59Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
